Archaeological sites and radiocarbon data: ( a) Kernel-smoothed intensity of sites (white dots) for 12–2 k 14C years before present, measured in points/km 2, ( b) Histogram of median calibrated radiocarbon ages placed in 200-year bins, ( c) Summed probability distribution of calibrated radiocarbon dates for entire South American dataset with a 100-year rolling mean (black solid line), shown with the highly correlated exploratory model fitted to data (exponential red dotted line), R
2 = 0.971, Pearson.
